original: Kärrdahl, Thor David Samuel, rektor, Varberg, f. 1/10/02 i Varberg av bokh. J. A. K. o. Emma J. Andersson. — Realex. 19, folksk :iär :ex. i Gbg 23. E. o. folksk :lär. i Varberg 23-25, ord. sed. 26, timlär. v. Varbergs stads yrkesisk. sed. 28, rektor där sed. 36, insp. f. Hall. 1. landstings yrkessk. o. SHSO instr :föreläsn., tf. folksk :-inisp. i Hall. n. insp :omr. 38, 42, 45, 46 o. 47. Led. av sitadsifullm. sed. 35, kyrkofulllm. sed. 3(2, kyrkoriådet sed. 45, fattigv :s:tyr. sed. 29, ied. av dir. f. kusit-san. Apelviken’ sied. 37, lied. av o. v. ordf. i nykiterh :nd:n sed. 37, ilär:kåren;s repr. i foKksk :styr. sed. 312. von Köhler, Gunnar, friherre, flyg-ingenjör, Linköping, f. 17/10/10 i Huddinge, Sthlms 1., av civiling., frih. C. A. von Köhler o. h. h., f. Stabeli. G. 35 m. Gertrud Nilsson. Barn: Christina f. 35, Agneta 38, Reinhold 40, Fredrik 42, Suzanne 45. —■ Avg:ex. fr. Tekn. elem:sk. i Norrköp. 33, reserv^-off:ex. i flygv. 35. Fänrik i flygv. res. 35, ing. v. Sv. Järnv :verkstädernas aeroplanavd. 35, ing. o. provflyg. v. flygförvaltn. försökscentral å Malmslätt 36-42, löjtn. i flygv. res. 38, flyg-ing. av tredje gr. v. flygv. 43, av andra gr. 45 o. av första gr. 46, andre flot-tiljing. v. Västg. flygflottilj i Karlsborg 43-46, förste dito v. Östg. flygflottilj å Malmslätt sed. 46, tillika be-siktn :man f. luftfartyg sed. 44. Flyg-lär. i Linköp. flygklubb 36-42. Aero-klubbens silverplakett.
translated:
Kärrdahl, Thor David Samuel, principal, Varberg, b. 1/10/02 in Varberg, son of bookkeeper J. A. K. and Emma J. Andersson. — Completed realexamen at 19, qualified as a primary school teacher in Gothenburg in 1923. Assistant primary school teacher in Varberg from 1923-1925, regular from 1926. Part-time teacher at Varbergs stads yrkesisk. from 1928, principal there from 1936. Inspector at Hall. 1. landstings yrkessk. and SHSO instructor, acting principal of primary schools in Hallands Inspektoratsområde in 1938, 1942, 1945, 1946, and 1947. Member of the city council since 1935, member of the church council since 1932, member of the church board since 1945, member of the poor relief board since 1929, member of the board of directors for child care center Apelviken since 1937, member and vice-chairman of the Nykterhetsförbundet (Temperance Association) since 1937, representative for the teacher corps in the primary school administration since 1932. 
von Köhler, Gunnar, Baron, aeronautical engineer, Linköping, b. 17/10/10 in Huddinge, Stockholm County, son of engineer, Baron C. A. von Köhler and his wife, maiden name Stabeli. Married to Gertrud Nilsson since 1935. Children: Christina b. 1935, Agneta 1938, Reinhold 1940, Fredrik 1942, Suzanne 1945. Graduated from Technical Elementary School in Norrköping in 1933, reserve officer candidate in aviation in 1935. Ensign in the reserve aviation in 1935, engineer at Sv. Järnv :verkstädernas aeroplanavd. (Swedish locomotive workshop airplane division) in 1935, engineer and test pilot at the Swedish Air Administration's test center in Malmslätt from 1936-1942, lieutenant in the reserve aviation in 1938, third-grade aeronautical engineer in the aviation in 1943, second-grade in 1945, and first-grade in 1946, second squadron leader at Västg. flygflottilj (West air wing) in Karlsborg from 1943-1946, first squadron leader at Östg. flygflottilj (East air wing) in Malmslätt since 1946, also serves as an aircraft inspector since 1944. Flight instructor at the Linköping Aviation Club from 1936-1942. Aero Club's silver plaque.
